display_name: Child Health Questionnaire Parent Form 50 Questions: Sometimes families may have difficulty getting along with one another. They do not always agree and they may get angry. In general, how would you rate your family's ability to get along with one another?
description:
Item from the Child Health Questionnaire Parent Form 50 Questions (CHQ-PF50). [Asmussen L et al, 2000 (PubMed ID: 11029320)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11029320/)

[Search for all CHQ-PF50 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/cfs/variables?search=chqpf50)
